00029 namespace CaduneTree {
00030 
00031         const unsigned int Parameters::mMaxLevels = 4; // 4 is a reasonable number, official in v0.6
00032 
00033         Parameters::Parameters() : mTaper( 1.0f ) {
00034                 // First allocate memory for arrays, + 1 because there is an additional root level
00035                 mNumVertices = new unsigned char[ mMaxLevels + 1 ];
00036                 mNumBranches = new unsigned char[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00037                 mDownAngle = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00038                 mDownAngleV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00039                 mRotate = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00040                 mRotateV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00041                 mLength = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00042                 mLengthV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00043                 mCurve = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00044                 mCurveBack = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00045                 mCurveV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00046                 mCurveRes = new unsigned char[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00047 
00048                 // Always set params to default
00049                 setDefault();
00050         }
00051 
00052         Parameters::Parameters( const Parameters& params ) : mTaper( 1.0f ) {
00053                 // First allocate memory for arrays
00054                 mNumVertices = new unsigned char[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00055                 mNumBranches = new unsigned char[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00056                 mDownAngle = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00057                 mDownAngleV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00058                 mRotate = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00059                 mRotateV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00060                 mLength = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00061                 mLengthV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00062                 mCurve = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00063                 mCurveBack = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00064                 mCurveV = new float[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00065                 mCurveRes = new unsigned char[ mMaxLevels + 1];
00066 
00067                 // General
00068                 mShape = params.mShape;
00069                 mBaseSize = params.mBaseSize;
00070                 mScale = params.mScale;
00071                 mScaleV = params.mScaleV;
00072                 mNumLevels = params.mNumLevels;
00073                 mRatio = params.mRatio;
00074                 mRatioPower = params.mRatioPower;
00075                 mNumLobes = params.mNumLobes;
00076                 mLobeDepth = params.mLobeDepth;
00077                 mFlare = params.mFlare;
00078                 mScale0 = params.mScale0;
00079                 mScale0V = params.mScale0V;
00080                 mBarkMaterial = params.mBarkMaterial;
00081                 // Leaves
00082                 mNumLeaves = params.mNumLeaves;
00083                 mLeafScale = params.mLeafScale;
00084                 mLeafScaleX = params.mLeafScaleX;
00085                 mLeafQuality = params.mLeafQuality;
00086                 mLeafLayoutExp = params.mLeafLayoutExp;
00087                 mLeafMaterial = params.mLeafMaterial;
00088                 // Fronds
00089                 mNumFronds = params.mNumFronds;
00090                 mFrondScale = params.mFrondScale;
00091                 mFrondScaleX = params.mFrondScaleX;
00092                 mFrondQuality = params.mFrondQuality;
00093                 mFrondMaterial = params.mFrondMaterial;
00094                 //
00095                 mAttractionUp = params.mAttractionUp;
00096                 // Leveled info
00097                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mMaxLevels + 1; ++i ) {
00098                         mNumVertices[ i ] = params.mNumVertices[ i ];
00099                         mNumBranches[ i ] = params.mNumBranches[ i ];
00100                         mDownAngle[ i ] = params.mDownAngle[ i ];
00101                         mDownAngleV[ i ] = params.mDownAngleV[ i ];
00102                         mRotate[ i ] = params.mRotate[ i ];
00103                         mRotateV[ i ] = params.mRotateV[ i ];
00104                         mLength[ i ] = params.mLength[ i ];
00105                         mLengthV[ i ] = params.mLengthV[ i ];
00106                         mCurve[ i ] = params.mCurve[ i ];
00107                         mCurveBack[ i ] = params.mCurveBack[ i ];
00108                         mCurveV[ i ] = params.mCurveV[ i ];
00109                         mCurveRes[ i ] = params.mCurveRes[ i ];
00110                 }
00111         }
00112 
00113         Parameters::~Parameters() {
00114                 delete [] mNumVertices;
00115                 delete [] mNumBranches;
00116                 delete [] mDownAngle;
00117                 delete [] mDownAngleV;
00118                 delete [] mRotate;
00119                 delete [] mRotateV;
00120                 delete [] mLength;
00121                 delete [] mLengthV;
00122                 delete [] mCurve;
00123                 delete [] mCurveBack;
00124                 delete [] mCurveV;
00125                 delete [] mCurveRes;
00126         }
00127 
00128         void Parameters::setDefault() {
00129                 // General
00130                 mShape = TEND_FLAME;
00131                 mBaseSize = 0.3f;
00132                 mScale = 13.0f;
00133                 mScaleV = 3.0f;
00134                 mNumLevels = 2;
00135                 mRatio = 0.03f;
00136                 mRatioPower = 1.0f;
00137                 mNumLobes = 5;
00138                 mLobeDepth = 0.2f;
00139                 mFlare = 1.4f;
00140                 mScale0 = 1.0f;
00141                 mScale0V = 0.0f;
00142                 mBarkMaterial = "BarkNoLighting";
00143                 // Leaves
00144                 mNumLeaves = 4;
00145                 mLeafScale = 1.4f;
00146                 mLeafScaleX = 1.0f;
00147                 mLeafQuality = 1.0f;
00148                 mLeafLayoutExp = 4.0f;
00149                 mLeafMaterial = "Leaves";
00150                 // Fronds
00151                 mNumFronds = 4;
00152                 mFrondScale = 1.0f;
00153                 mFrondScaleX = 1.0f;
00154                 mFrondQuality = 1.0f;
00155                 mFrondMaterial = "Frond";
00156                 //
00157                 mAttractionUp = 0.5f;
00158                 // Trunk - level 0, null not used params
00159                 mNumVertices[ 0 ] = 8;
00160                 mNumBranches[ 0 ] = 0;
00161                 mDownAngle[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00162                 mDownAngleV[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00163                 mRotate[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00164                 mRotateV[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00165                 mLength[ 0 ] = 1.0f;
00166                 mLengthV[ 0 ] = 0.0f;
00167                 mCurve[ 0 ] = 20.0f;
00168                 mCurveBack[ 0 ] = -15.0f;
00169                 mCurveV[ 0 ] = 20.0f;
00170                 mCurveRes[ 0 ] = 8;
00171                 // Level 1
00172                 mNumVertices[ 1 ] = 4;
00173                 mNumBranches[ 1 ] = 20;
00174                 mDownAngle[ 1 ] = 80.0f;
00175                 mDownAngleV[ 1 ] = 5.0f;
00176                 mRotate[ 1 ] = 140.0f;
00177                 mRotateV[ 1 ] = 0.0f;
00178                 mLength[ 1 ] = 0.4f;
00179                 mLengthV[ 1 ] = 0.0f;
00180                 mCurve[ 1 ] = -30.0f;
00181                 mCurveBack[ 1 ] = 0.0f;
00182                 mCurveV[ 1 ] = 10.0f;
00183                 mCurveRes[ 1 ] = 4;
00184                 // Roots
00185                 mNumVertices[ mMaxLevels ] = 6;
00186                 mNumBranches[ mMaxLevels ] = 6;
00187                 mDownAngle[ mMaxLevels ] = 95.0f;
00188                 mDownAngleV[ mMaxLevels ] = 5.0f;
00189                 mRotate[ mMaxLevels ] = 140.0f;
00190                 mRotateV[ mMaxLevels ] = 0.0f;
00191                 mLength[ mMaxLevels ] = 0.4f;
00192                 mLengthV[ mMaxLevels ] = 0.0f;
00193                 mCurve[ mMaxLevels ] = 20.0f;
00194                 mCurveBack[ mMaxLevels ] = -5.0f;
00195                 mCurveV[ mMaxLevels ] = 5.0f;
00196                 mCurveRes[ mMaxLevels ] = 4;
00197 
00198                 // Null remainning data
00199                 for( unsigned int i = 2; i < mMaxLevels; ++i ) {
00200                         mNumVertices[ i ] = 0;
00201                         mNumBranches[ i ] = 0;
00202                         mDownAngle[ i ] = 0.0f;
00203                         mDownAngleV[ i ] = 0.0f;
00204                         mRotate[ i ] = 0.0f;
00205                         mRotateV[ i ] = 0.0f;
00206                         mLength[ i ] = 0.0f;
00207                         mLengthV[ i ] = 0.0f;
00208                         mCurve[ i ] = 0.0f;
00209                         mCurveBack[ i ] = 0.0f;
00210                         mCurveV[ i ] = 0.0f;
00211                         mCurveRes[ i ] = 0;
00212                 }
00213 
00214         }

00216         Parameters* Parameters::createCopy() const {
00217                 Parameters *params = new Parameters;
00218                 
00219                 // General
00220                 params->mShape = mShape;
00221                 params->mBaseSize = mBaseSize;
00222                 params->mScale = mScale;
00223                 params->mScaleV = mScaleV;
00224                 params->mNumLevels = mNumLevels;
00225                 params->mRatio = mRatio;
00226                 params->mRatioPower = mRatioPower;
00227                 params->mNumLobes = mNumLobes;
00228                 params->mLobeDepth = mLobeDepth;
00229                 params->mFlare = mFlare;
00230                 params->mScale0 = mScale0;
00231                 params->mScale0V = mScale0V;
00232                 params->mBarkMaterial = mBarkMaterial;
00233                 // Leaves
00234                 params->mNumLeaves = mNumLeaves;
00235                 params->mLeafScale = mLeafScale;
00236                 params->mLeafScaleX = mLeafScaleX;
00237                 params->mLeafQuality = mLeafQuality;
00238                 params->mLeafLayoutExp = mLeafLayoutExp;
00239                 params->mLeafMaterial = mLeafMaterial;
00240                 // Fronds
00241                 params->mNumFronds = mNumFronds;
00242                 params->mFrondScale = mFrondScale;
00243                 params->mFrondScaleX = mFrondScaleX;
00244                 params->mFrondQuality = mFrondQuality;
00245                 params->mFrondMaterial = mFrondMaterial;
00246                 //
00247                 params->mAttractionUp = mAttractionUp;
00248                 // Leveled info
00249                 for( unsigned int i = 0; i < mMaxLevels + 1; ++i ) {
00250                         params->mNumVertices[ i ] = mNumVertices[ i ];
00251                         params->mNumBranches[ i ] = mNumBranches[ i ];
00252                         params->mDownAngle[ i ] = mDownAngle[ i ];
00253                         params->mDownAngleV[ i ] = mDownAngleV[ i ];
00254                         params->mRotate[ i ] = mRotate[ i ];
00255                         params->mRotateV[ i ] = mRotateV[ i ];
00256                         params->mLength[ i ] = mLength[ i ];
00257                         params->mLengthV[ i ] = mLengthV[ i ];
00258                         params->mCurve[ i ] = mCurve[ i ];
00259                         params->mCurveBack[ i ] = mCurveBack[ i ];
00260                         params->mCurveV[ i ] = mCurveV[ i ];
00261                         params->mCurveRes[ i ] = mCurveRes[ i ];
00262                 }
00263 
00264                 return params;
00265         }

00267         unsigned char Parameters::getCurveRes( unsigned int level ) {
00268                 if( level <= mMaxLevels )
00269                         return mCurveRes[ level ];
00270                 return 0;
00271         }

00276                 return 0.0f;
